name: An Appealing Story
description:
"Today seems normal" isn't something the main character would say in this game.

Welcome to An Appealing Story, a narrative text-based adventure game where your decisions get out of hand rather quickly!

Sometimes life gets out of control, and we can't do anything about. We can only sit with ourselves and reflect.

Have fun!~

There are 7 different endings! And you don't have to go through all the endings at one siting, because your progress is saved!

This game has a little bit under 4000 words all written within the 48 hours of the game jam. I hope you enjoy the adventure :3!

This game was made by a team of 4 developers!
